Package com.jogamp.opengl.util.stereo

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    StereoDevice
    Interface describing a native stereoscopic device
    StereoDeviceRenderer
    Stereoscopic device rendering interface.
    StereoDeviceRenderer.Eye
    Interface describing one eye of the stereoscopic device, see StereoDeviceRenderer.getEye(int).
    StereoGLEventListener
    Extended GLEventListener and CustomGLEventListener interface supporting stereoscopic client rendering.
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    EyeParameter
    Constant parameter for one eye.
    EyePose
    Position and orientation of one eye.
    StereoClientRenderer
    StereoClientRenderer utilizing StereoDeviceRenderer implementing GLEventListener for convenience.
    StereoDevice.Config
    Merely a class providing a type-tag for extensions
    StereoDeviceFactory
    Platform agnostic StereoDevice factory.
    StereoUtil  
  • Enum Summary 
    Enum Description
    StereoDeviceFactory.DeviceType
    StereoDevice type used for createFactory(type).
